translations.en:
: ** :house: You arrive at a plain where a single small house stands. As you get closer, you see a man working on an incandescent piece of metal.

:hammer: Chat with the worker
ğŸ› Ask to stay the night to rest and recover
:walking: You don't have time to lose! Continue walking!

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

translations.en: ** | ğŸ”¨ The man sees you and suggests that you make an object with him. After almost an hour, your creation is finished. The man offers it to you as a reward!

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ”¨ Vous regardez l'ouvrier fabriquer une hache pendant une dizaine de minutes avant de vous dÃ©cider Ã  reprendre la route.
translations.en: ** | ğŸ”¨ You watch the worker make an axe for about ten minutes before you decide to hit the road again.

Maladroit, vous ne mettez pas longtemps Ã  Ã©chapper votre lourde crÃ©ation sur le pied. Gravement blessÃ©, vous abandonnez lâ€™idÃ©e de crÃ©er votre propre arme. :dizzy_face: !
translations.en: ** | ğŸ”¨ The worker sees you and suggests that you make a sword with him. Enthusiastic about getting a new weapon, you accept. You don't take long to clumsily drop your heavy creation onto your foot. Seriously wounded, you give up the idea of creating your own weapon. :dizzy_face: !

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ› AprÃ¨s avoir discutÃ© rapidement avec l'homme, ce dernier accepte de vous hÃ©berger pour la nuit. EpuisÃ©, vous vous Ã©croulez de fatigue sur le lit :sleeping:
translations.en: ** | ğŸ› After a quick chat with the man, he agrees to take you in for the night. Exhausted, you collapse from fatigue on the bed :sleeping:

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ› L'homme vous avoue rapidement ne pas pouvoir vous hÃ©berger pour la nuit mais vous propose de partager son repas. Vous refusez poliment et reprenez votre route.
translations.en: ** | ğŸ› The man quickly admits he can't accommodate you for the night, but offers to share his meal with you. You politely refuse and go back on your way.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ› Vous n'obtenez en rÃ©ponse qu'un simple grognement. Les habitants de la rÃ©gion semblent ne pas apprÃ©cier les Ã©trangers
translations.en: ** | ğŸ› You only get a simple growl in response. The residents of the region seem to dislike foreigners

translations.en: ** | ğŸ› The man quickly refuses to share his bed with you but offers to share his dinner with you. Hungry and exhausted, you accept his offer.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš¶ Vous partez sans perdre de temps.

translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ You decide to continue walking despite the fatigue. After a few miles, you collapse at the side of the road. :sick:
